title: Hour 1 - Justin Thomas PGA Win, Luka Doncic Needs Help
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Justin Thomas PGA Win, Luka Doncic Needs Help
description:
Dan recaps the action over the weekend including the PGA Championship playoff and the Warriors taking a 3-0 lead over Luka Doncic and the Dallas Mavericks in the NBA Western Conference Finals.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
